name: C'est La V
description:
The masked crusader that has been cleaning up the streets of Tokyo needs your help! Step into Sailor V’s shoes and rid the city of the foulest of monsters and villains.  

Controls:

  • Left and right arrow keys to move
  • Z or C to punch
  • X or V to kick
  • Down arrow key to block (if you have shield left)
  • Up arrow key to jump

Art by:

Jamie Chen

Sydney Schiller

Music by:

Davey Jay Belliss

Programmed by:

Davey Jay Belliss

Jessica Hsieh

Dan Nguyen

Mark Nickerson

Sydney Schiller

Special Thanks:
